name: ACMA 201 D100
prerequisites: MATH 152 with a minimum grade of C; or MATH 155 or MATH 158, with a grade of at least B.

name: ACMA 336 D100
prerequisites: Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one but preferably two terms in advance. They will normally be required to have completed 45 units with a GPA of 2.50 before they may take this practicum course.

name: ACMA 337 D100
prerequisites: ACMA 336 or Job Practicum I from another department. Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one term in advance.

name: ACMA 436 D100
prerequisites: ACMA 337 or Job Practicum II from another department. Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one term in advance.

name: ACMA 437 D100
prerequisites: ACMA 436 or Job Practicum III from another department. Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one term in advance.

name: ACMA 438 D100
prerequisites: ACMA 437 or Job Practicum IV from another department. Students must apply and receive permission from the co-op coordinator at least one term in advance.
